name: Fiona
description: A powerful Executor and an outstanding Archon.

set.set_2: After dealing damage, increase attack by **16%**/**18%**/**20%**/**22%** for **3000** seconds. This effect does not stack. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.set_4: While Benediction Resonance is not active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage by **17%**/**19%**/**21%**/**23%** for **2000** seconds. While Benediction Resonance is active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage for self and teammates by **9%**/**10%**/**11%**/**12%** for **2000** seconds. Final damage is additionally increased based on base attack by (Base ATK/**10,000**)%, up to **5%**. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
